targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "temperature")

from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "dewpoint")

from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "humidity")

from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "vpd")

from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush_V")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rssi")

panels.description: This plot shows always the last Voltage value which has been reported to the cloud!

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush_V")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "voltage")

panels.title: Battery voltage

targets.query:
from(bucket: "sensorpush_dotnet")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "SensorPush")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pressure")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "sensor_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: sensors
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
